charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_1101_0100_20:
Hau asked [Name:PlayerNickname ] to come to
the village to help out with a matter related to
Tapu Koko.
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_0401_0400_10: Lillie’s gonna help us today, too!
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_0302_0500_10: Did you ask Lillie for help, too?
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_1201_0700_10:
A Tapu Koko saved me in Alola once, so I want
to help...
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_1201_0800_10:
But this Tapu Koko seems different from the
guardian deity in Alola.
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_1201_1000_10: So, what I needed your help with was...
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_1201_1100_10:
I want to you to hold an all-out battle that we
can offer to Tapu Koko as part of a festival!
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_0401_1300_10:
Yup! We haven’t decided when it’ll happen
yet, though.
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_0402_1500_10: We don’t really have a time set for it yet.
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_1201_1600_10:
We’re just planning to get together with everyone
when something fun happens...and, well, make
some noise!
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_1201_1700_10:
Hau’s town back home was always like that,
wasn’t it.
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_1201_1800_10:
Back in Alola, Tapu Koko is known as the guardian
deity of Melemele Island.
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_1201_1900_10:
It loves combat, so at the festivals back home,
we’d show it Pokémon battles!
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_0302_2200_10: I don’t know if I can do that...
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_0402_2300_10: You don’t have to overthink it!
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_1201_2400_10:
Just go all out together with your partner, like you
always do!
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_1201_2500_10: Ahaha! Tapu Koko seems interested in you.
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_1201_2600_10:
Do you think it wants to battle you, 
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_0401_2800_10:
Thanks, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m sure Tapu
Koko is happy to hear that, too!
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_0302_2900_10: If that’s what Tapu Koko wants!
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_0402_3000_10:
Ho! Are you all fired up now, too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_1201_3100_10: Let’s make this exciting—and have a fun festival!
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_1201_3200_10:
Me and Tapu Koko always go all out when we
battle at festivals!
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_1201_3300_10:
This Tapu Koko just can’t seem to sit still when
watching battles...
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_1201_3400_10:
And more importantly, a battle is the best way
to say thank you to Tapu Koko!
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_1201_3600_10:
Why don’t we get some practice in before
the festival?
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_1201_3800_10:
May this Pokémon battle be an offering
to Tapu Koko!
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_1201_3900_10:
Before you stands Lillie, a kind soul who strives
to foster connections with her Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_1201_4000_10:
And before her, [Name:PlayerNickname ]—
one who Tapu Koko has taken an interest in.
charaepi_ch0098_10_hau/2301_1201_4200_10:
When you say it in that sygna suit, you’re the
spitting image of Hala!
